snippet.title: The Grammys you didn't see: Chris and Rihanna cuddle, Ellen gets an eyeful
snippet.description:
* We live for the reaction shots and photos of audience members at the Grammys, which is often more entertaining than what happens on stage. For the 2013 show, so far we've spotted Rihanna and Chris Brown getting cozy in the audience, as seen above. Ri...
http://marquee.blogs.cnn.com/2013/02/10/the-grammys-you-didnt-see-chris-and-rihanna-cuddle-ellen-gets-an-eyeful/

snippet.title: Rihanna on Chris Brown: We know what we have
snippet.description:
* Rihanna has opened up like never before about getting back together with her ex-boyfriend, Chris Brown, and what it means for her public image.
http://www.cnn.com/2013/01/30/showbiz/music/rihanna-chris-brown-rolling-stone/index.html

snippet.title: Rihanna and Chris Brown tease us yet again
snippet.description:
* Oh social media, you never seem to fail us. Were it not for Instagram, we wouldn't know where Rihanna and Chris Brown spent New Years. We won't keep you in suspense â€“ it appears they may have been in bed together. E! online reports that the pair...
http://marquee.blogs.cnn.com/2013/01/02/rihanna-and-chris-brown-tease-us-yet-again/

snippet.title: Rihanna posts cuddly pic with Chris Brown
snippet.description:
* Rihanna and Chris Brown are at it again. And by "it" we mean letting the world know that their friendship (or whatever you want to call it) is still going strong. Rihanna posted a picture on her Instagram account of her hugging a man who judging by the...
http://marquee.blogs.cnn.com/2012/11/30/rihanna-posts-cuddly-pic-with-chris-brown/

snippet.title: Chris Brown renews 'friendship' with Rihanna
snippet.description:
* Chris Brown acknowledged Thursday he has renewed his "friendship" with Rihanna, the woman he was convicted of beating on the eve of the Grammys in February 2009.
http://www.cnn.com/2012/10/04/showbiz/chris-brown-rihanna/index.html

snippet.title: Rihanna on Chris Brown: 'I lost my best friend'
snippet.description:
* Rihanna has been pretty open about the fact that, when it comes to whatever dealings she may have with former boyfriend Chris Brown (who pled guilty to assaulting her in 2009), she's going to do what she wants. Three years and two remixes later, the...
http://marquee.blogs.cnn.com/2012/08/17/rihanna-on-chris-brown-i-lost-my-best-friend/

snippet.title: Rihanna on Chris Brown: I'm going to do what I want
snippet.description:
* Say what you will about Rihanna's collaboration and seeming reconciliation with her ex Chris Brown, who pleaded guilty to one count of assault in connection to an argument he had with the Barbadian pop star in 2009, but the singer is hearing none of...
http://marquee.blogs.cnn.com/2012/04/04/rihanna-on-chris-brown-im-going-to-do-what-i-want/

snippet.title: Rihanna on Chris Brown remixes: It's innocent
snippet.description:
* The Internet seemed to go into shock last month when Rihanna and Chris Brown released two remixes, each containing vocals of the other, but Rihanna doesn't see what all of the fuss was about. The pop star told Ryan Seacrest on his radio show Thursday...
http://marquee.blogs.cnn.com/2012/03/15/rihanna-on-chris-brown-remixes-its-innocent/
